<title level="1" right="Trait">[Charau-ka](/Traits.aspx?ID=263)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 308 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

Mandrill-like humanoids that are brutal warriors. Many charau-ka live in Usaro.
